name: Guacamole and chips
description: A refreshing appetizer with an avacado based dip originating from Mexico

name: Mole negro
description: A sause made from smoked black chilies, prunes and chocolate

name: Arroz verde
description: Short-grain paella rice with clams and small prawns, garlic and parsley

name: Flan
description: A sweet pudding containing eggs milk and sugar covered in caramel

name: Queso fundido
description: Melted cheese and chorizo with spicy ground pork sausage

name: Tostadas de tinga
description: A fried corn tortillas topped with meat and beans, lettuce tomatoes, cheese and sour cream

name: Tacos al pastor
description: Thinly sliced marinated pork with onions pinaple and cilantro

name: Enchiladas verdes
description: A homemade green enchilada sauce made of roasted tomatillos, onions, and serrano chilis blended with garlic, lime juice, cilantro, chicken stock, and sour cream wrapped in a tortilla with chicken and cheese

name: Elote
description: Corn on the cob charred on the grill, then slathered in a spicy and creamy chili, garlic, and Cotija cheese spiked sauce

name: Tres leches
description: Sponge cake soaked in evaporated milk, condensed milk and whole milk. with creame, icing, vanilla extract and eggs
